content: I've removed @osbyrne posted message because I am pretty suspicious of new users posting a link as their first interaction. I have not clicked the link, please contact me in private message if you did. osbyrne's profile picture even looks like a mischievous virus :p
I have de-activated the account of @osbyrne and have given them an option to contact me so they can make the case that they are a legitimate user.

yo I am osbyrne
sorry for the suspiciousness

the website typedream dot com is legit, its used to make nocode websites
when you create your own (and don't pay for domain) it shows as [websiteName].typedream.app
yes my pfp looks someshat like a virus lol
All good, your account has been re-activated. I apologize for the false positive, I hope you can understand our cautious approach.
